message: Hi Bob, I have a product that I believe will be of great value to you. I'm offering it to you for $2000000.  It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity.  Let me know your thoughts.
Alice, your product sounds interesting, but $2000000 is a bit out of my range.  I'm willing to pay $1200000 for it.  Let me know if that's something you'd be willing to consider.
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  $1200000 is a bit lower than I'd hoped for.  How about we split the difference?  I'm willing to accept $1600000.  Let's see if we can make this work.
Alice, I understand your position, but $1600000 is still a bit high for me.  I'm willing to go up to $1400000.  Let's see if we can come to an agreement.
